meanings.definition: A written or verbal request inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something.
meanings.sent1: She received many invitations to attend the party.
meanings.sent2: The wedding invitations were beautifully designed.
meanings.sent3: The invitations to the picnic made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His invitations to join him on adventures were always exciting.
meanings.sent5: The invitations to explore the enchanted forest were irresistible.

meanings.definition: The action of inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something.
meanings.sent1: Sending out invitations for the event was a fun task.
meanings.sent2: The invitations for the conference were sent out well in advance.
meanings.sent3: His invitations to play basketball were always met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The invitations to join the club opened up new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The invitations to travel the world sparked her sense of adventure.
